<nowiki>[[http://ubuntuweblogs.org|UbuntuWeblogs.org]]</nowiki> ''(also know as Planet Ubuntu Users)'' is a Planet which aggregates public written weblogs that talk about Ubuntu. Unlike the official <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.com|Planet Ubuntu]]</nowiki> all bloggers can be aggregated on this site, as long as they follow a simple set of <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuweblogs.org/submit.html|rules]]</nowiki>.
